Detailed Description

template<class Payload>
class LCPayload< Payload >

Specific LCIO implementation of the interface to store generic user data.

Member Function Documentation

template<class Payload >
const std::string LCPayload< Payload >::getDataDescription (  )  const [inline, virtual]

The description string.

A comma separated list of pairs of type identifier, one of 'i','f','d' followed by ':' and an attribute name, e.g. "i:cellId,f:offset,f:gain".
